programme.desc: Bing discovers a hole in his favourite yellow wellies but he doesnt want to throw them away in the stinky dustbin.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop hear the familiar jingle of Gillys ice cream van and race across the park to find her. After a long run Bing finally gets his ice cream but as he waves goodbye to Gilly he tips the ice cream out of the cone.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: In the absence of a real plaster, Bing makes one out of sticky tape, but it’s so sticky that it hurts when he tries to take it off.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing loves Arlo the cat. They are friends. Bing strokes the kitty and they play hide and seek, but what happens when Bing meets a cat that isnt as friendly?

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop find a patch of fluffy dandelions and blow all but one. Bing takes the last one to give to Sula but when she hugs him to say hello, the dandelion blows away.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Blueberry and Huckleberry pitch their new play, an adaptation of the Baby Berrykins’ favorite BerryFairyTale, “The Littlest Berrykin,” to Plum and the assembled cast and crew. We see the story they are narrating in action: a comedy about three princesses (played by Strawberry, Lemon and Raspberry) on a quest for a fabled Golden Berry to determine which of them is best suited to rule the kingdom—the King and Queen (Huck and Blueberry) are retiring to the tropics. Accompanied by their Berrykins-in-Waiting, the Princesses set off on the quest. Whichever one returns with the Golden Berry will be declared the new monarch.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Rosie wants to give her brothers a surprise afternoon snack in the forest. She needs Lucien, Loudo’s father’s help. He will accompany them to the wild bees nest that she has found. However, Berry’s unexpected presence will threaten Rosie’s plans.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: The series follows a warm father-son relationship that Little Nutbrown Hare decides he wants a clever long tail like his friends, rather than a short fluffy one. They help out by making him a long tail but all the results are either too tickly, bendy or flappy. When Big Nutbrown Hare spots his son from way across a grassy field everyone realizes that Little Nutbrown Hare’s little tail is clever in its own way.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: One Summer’s day Little Field Mouse is very excited to show Little Nutbrown Hare her new favourite thing, a very pretty flower… the prettiest ever! She lets Little Nutbrown Hare borrow it to show Big Nutbrown Hare, but when it blows away during the night Little Nutbrown Hare worries how his friend will react. Will he be able to work up the courage to tell her what happened?

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: The little friends decide to get rid of their old, unwanted items and organize a yard sale in the meadow. The old items lead to a lively barter, but a large pile of useless junk remains. The rubbishtruck of the quick beetles arrives to help, taking away the remaining items and assisting in cleaning the meadow.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse whos long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam has a toothache. His daddy goes to get Dr. Bobola, but Dan, his older brother, thinks the doctor is going to pull his tooth! To avoid this, Julia tries to takes care of Sam instead of the doctor.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: Poet is convinced that the frog they found in the garden is actually a princess, but Girl disagrees: it must be a prince! The three kids come up with plans to find out: how about observing how the animal reacts to jewelry or to Toto dressed up as a dragon? But the frog does not blink and there seems to be only one last solution. Turbulent volunteers to give it a kiss! However, nothing happens and the little frog just hops away while Poet and Girl cannot stop laughing: you kissed a frog!”

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: Mom tells Poet that he should put his cuddly bear in the washing machine, but he does not want to. Mom tries to discreetly steal the bear, but it is easier said than done. Seeing that she is having a hard time, Turbulent and Girl decide to give her a hand to retrieve the cuddly toy, however their commando mission proves to be more complicated than they planned, and the little bear ends up even dirtier than before. Poet can only resign, but what a joy it is to hug a fresh and clean teddy bear.

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: The trainees find a gold nugget and dream of ways to spend their riches.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Trevor leads The Pontypandy Pioneers on a dig to get their Dinosaur Badges. Peter finds what looks like a dinosaur fossil, but Nipper the dog snatches the bone and runs off, only to get stuck on a ledge over the edge of a cliff!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Four teams compete to win Malcolms Wildlife Photo Challenge

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate and her stuffed toy friends use their imaginations to go on wild and incredible adventures.

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate’s riding her bike for the first time without training wheels and she keeps falling. In Mimiloo, Kate and her friends must learn to fly giant wind flowers in order to surprise Lily at her Spring Thing party! But Mim-Mim has never flown a flower before, and Kate must help him gain his confidence to become a fully-fledged flower pilot.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: Caillou is sad when the sandcastle he built with Grandpa gets washed away. In a medieval fantasy, the Silver Knight (Caillou) helps the King (Daddy) rebuild his ruined castle, and Caillou learns that it’s the process of creating the castle that is the most fun.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: When Caillou accidentally breaks Clementines mom’s dinosaur model, he guiltily hides it, but that makes his tummy hurt. In a castaway fantasy, helping Rexy cure his own guilty tummy ache helps Caillou realize the importance of owning up to a mistake.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Gordon becomes very worried when he gets a serious case of the giggles.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Wanting to practicing her ability to be stealthy, Farah sneaks through the tall grass to not be noticed by the birds shes approaching. But she steps on a twig, revealing her presence. Coincidentally, she finds a broken tooth to an unknown animal. She calls up the Rangers to ask for more information. Back at the ranger base, Leo is hiding behind a tree trunk momentarily before Katie calls out for him and Hero in a game of hide and seek. Hero hides behind a rock but Katie manage to see his butt. Their game was cut short when Leo receives a call from Farah, asking help on the tooth she found. After learning the tooth came from the Clouded Leopard, the Rangers travel to Farahs whereabouts to help her give back to the animal. When they arrived, Leo uses his binoculars to scan for the animal on the trees. Hero managed to find a tail nearby so he barks at it, alarming the Rangers. Turns out the tail belongs to a Long-Tailed Macaque, which immediately flee away from the encounter. The Junior Rangers were disappointed for their failed search before stumbling upon Ranger Rocky in a bush who were studying earthworms. They told Ranger Rocky about their mission, to which he contact Ranger Joey for help. Ranger Joey helps giving the Rangers additional information on the Clouded Leopard and its behaviors.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Kyle is getting ready to dive into the sea, wearing his full diving gear. As he swims underwater with the fishes, he sees something struggling from a distance. Turns out its a dolphin and its stuggling because its trapped in a fishnet, causing Kyle to call for help. In the garden, Leo And Katie are playing with bubbles, having a friendly competition on who can make the biggest bubble. They get interrupted when Kyle tell them about the dolphin encounter. After learning about the animal, Kyle tell the Junior Ranger that the animal is squirming, scared that it might be in danger. The Ranger rush to meet with Kyle by taking the PlatypusOne. Once they arrived, Leo And Katie change into their diving gear. The pair jumps into the ocean, leaving Hero behind in the vehicle. Kyle tells the Rangers they cant come close to he dolphin as it keeps moving wildly and blow water out of its blowhole. Suddenly, the dolphin begins to cry. The Rangers have an idea that they need to play music to calm the animal, that is when Ranger Rocky arrive with his Umbrella Propeller and the Rangers explain the situation to him. Katie to begin playing music with her tablet, calming the animal momentarily before Ranger Rocky jumps into the water and break apart the fishnet with his bare hands. Suddenly, the dolphin barf out small pieces of food in a cloud of colored liquid, worrying the Rangers.

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Lizzy and Lauren arrange a horse riding lesson for Ben, and Pat brings Pumpkin the pony.

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Michael is organising an open-air movie night, but the film is accidentally lost.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Its Bings turn to choose a game at Ammas crèche so he picks Musical Statues but gets upset when he loses because he chose the game.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: When Bings mini racing car and the cereal box collide, they make a big mess. Voo Voo the vacuum cleaner does his job well - maybe even too well!

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Pando discover a new climbing frame at the playground. It’s got climbing bits, tippy bits and even a wobbly bridge. But when Bing gets to the top of the slide it’s too scary for him to go down. Bing watches Pando to see how he does it, then he helps Hoppity Voosh to go down. When Hoppity likes it Bing has a go too.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: When Coco and Charlie come to play at Bings house they measure how tall he is, but when they get the measuring ritual wrong, Bing is scared hes growing down!

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing is disappointed he cant go play because hes all sneezy but Sula and Amma bring him a nice carroty bagel to help him get better.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswalds piano has one key thats way off-key, thanks to an unseen ladybird who crawls under the lid. Oswald decides to take the piano to Maestro Bingos Music Shop where it will be fixed. On the way, he encounters his friends in numerous predicaments - each time the piano comes in handy helping them out. At the Music Shop, Maestro Bingo prescribes several cures, but nothing works. Finally, the ladybird crawls out of the piano - problem solved!

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald and Daisy find a duckling who’s lost her mother. With the help of the Egg Twins, Madame Butterfly and Johnny Snowman, they search all over town, but can’t find her anywhere. Daisy grows fond of the duckling as it reaches out to her for comfort but, when they find its mother, she reluctantly accepts the duckling is back where she belongs.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are setting up the Spring City Halloween Festival. Everyone is excited except Lofty. Lofty thinks Halloween is scary, so when he is sent to collect a giant ghost decoration he is more than nervous. Meanwhile Wendy is trying to play a Halloween trick on Bob but keeps ending up with the joke on her. Lofty arrives to collect the ghost decoration from Curtis but even the crate it is stored in looks scary. Determined to be brave, Lofty picks up the crate. But then he hears a rattling sound and thinks it’s the ghost. He zooms off, still carrying the crated ghost, hoping to get his scary job over with. By rushing off, he doesn’t realise that the crate is not locked.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and his crew are building a special area to celebrate local citizens who have improved the life of Spring City. Each recipient will get to see his or her image inside a golden star on a plinth. But Mayor Madison is struggling to decide who exactly will feature in the very first golden star. Various suggestions include Mr. Bentley, who is very keen to be chosen, Tilly and Jenny. But when the Spring City Rockets suggest Betsy, Scoop decides that the honour should go to a machine – and that machine should be him. Scoop shows off in front of Maria hoping he will be chosen. But his reckless behavior results in cutting through an electric cable and causing a massive power cut.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: It’s Spring blossom season and the pretty pink blossoms that come floating down the stream remind Big Nutbrown Hare of a magnificent cherry tree from his youth. He sets off cross- country to find it, with Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse, but the journey is longer and harder than he remembered. Will the blossoms floating downstream give them a clue as to a shorter way home?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends go on a hunt for treasure in the meadow and collect all kinds of unique gems like flowers, feathers, apples and egg-shells. But there’s a hole in Little Nutbrown Hare’s leaf-bag and he loses the precious collection along the way. Luckily, Big Nutbrown Hare is not far behind to collect the lost treasure as well as follow its trail to find his son.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse innocently pick lots of Spring flowers from a field and deliver bunches to their friends. When they realise that they are being followed everywhere by a cloud of yellow butterflies, they realise that the butterflies need the flowers, to feed from their nectar. How will they lead the little butterflies to more flowers and sweet nectar?

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: The class are going camping and Timmy wants to build his own tent. What does he need for his camping trip?

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: The kids search for the owner of a sketchbook that contains drawings done from a high point of view. After determining the artist wasnt drawing at the top of a ladder or up in a tree, they discover the sketchbook belongs to one of Busytowns tallest residents, Jeremy Giraffe. / Huckle and gang investigate a strange temperature drop which turns Busytowns summer to winter.

programme.title: Messy Goes to Okido
programme.desc: Messys hiccups cause a landslide while out on a nature walk, will he be able to find his way home? And will he ever stop hiccuping?

programme.title: Messy Goes to Okido
programme.desc: Messy has to deliver the giant pongberry to the Pongberry Pie Festival, before it goes off and releases a terrible pong in Okido City!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Asked by the girls to play Prince Berry Charming in the new play that Plum is directing for the Baby Berrykins, Huck pushes aside his reluctance and says yes. Bad goes to comically worse as the girls discover he can’t act, can’t dance, can’t sing, suffers from extreme stage fright, and never really wanted to do the play in the first place. After dress rehearsal devolves into a comedy of errors, Strawberry finally gets the sheepish Huck to confess that acting, singing and dancing are just not for him.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: When Harry finds a nest with an egg in it he wants to keep it, but Nana explains that it wouldnt be fair.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry wants to stay up all night so he goes to Dino-World where he can play for as long as he wants.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Peyo and Pico are enjoying a day on a raft, drifting on a lake in Mexico, discovers a three-legged axolotl in murky water and becomes determined to help but the axolotl swims back underwater. In the garden, Leo and Katie are naming animals that can stand on one leg while standing on one leg themselves. Peyo contacts Leo about a lizard with a missing leg, later identified as an axolotl. Leo and Katie learn about axolotls regenerative abilities on the computer. The rangers travel to the lake to relocate the axolotl but first, they must find it! Leo and Hero get ready to swim underwater while Katie, Pico and Peyo assist Leo through Hero Cam. After stumbling upon Ranger Rocky who calls Ranger Joey for information, they find and relocate three axolotls, facing a tilapia attack but Hero comes to the rescue. In the clean area, the axolotls settle in. In the Garden, Hero proves to Leo and Katie that he too, can stand on one leg.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: When Kenji hears that he must travel home to Japan alone, he gets scared and tries to hide. So, Thomas sets out to find him.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: In an attempt to beat Thomas in a race, Cleo decides to use the railway lines instead of the road. She soon learns that the roads are much safer for a little car.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Grisu, with Stella’s help, has to pilot a special drone that Mr Guellec bought for his farm, where a Rainbow Magpie is ruining his fruits. The drone’s loudspeaker is supposed to emit a sound that will repel the bird in a harmless way, but things don’t go as planned. Not only does the Rainbow Magpie look unaffected by the drone, but it even mistakes it for a bird and chases after it. Grisu has a hard time shooing the bird away - with Fumè’s intervention making things worse - until he finds out that luring it to the nearby forest is much more effective…

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Grisu helps Toramento, who is setting up a sightseeing tour of the Pink Cave of the Valley. But some funny facts happen in the Cave: signs moving apparently by themselves, strange noises… Toramento suspects that a ghost lives there, but Grisu doesn’t believe it. After a little mayhem, the little dragon finds out that the funny facts are caused by a small but sassy bat, who lives in the Cave and is annoyed by artificial light. Eventually, Grisu, helped by Stella and Toramento, creates a light system built with luminescent rocks, that spreads a soft glow that doesn’t annoy the bat.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: When Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse find a strange set of prints in the snow and hunt for the owner, their imaginations run away with them

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare discovers he cant fit under his favourite hiding log anymore. With Big Nutbrown Hares help, he learns he has grown bigger since last Spring, and can now clamber into a hole in a tree thats an even better hiding place. Big Nutbrown Hare learns that you are never too young to play.

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: Hoot and Toot must make deliveries through the night, finishing before sunrise. Away from Chuggington, when Hoot’s light fails, he screeches to a halt and is too scared to move! But with some gentle encouragement and clever shadow play from Toot, Hoot realises how much fun the night time can be. All their jobs get done before sunrise, and the twins win their badges

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Rosie has promised to accompany Biva to her exam. However, the very same day, her father Basil arrives unexpectedly.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Saffi has won a “Design a Statue” competition and now Bob and the team are turning her design into a water-fountain for the shopping mall. Saffi explains that her elephant statue design was based on her favourite toy, Mr Trunkers, but has since lost him. So when Muck is chosen to deliver the elephant statue, he promises to take extra special care of it for Saffi. But in his excitement, Muck accidentally knocks the elephant into a wall and scrapes off its paint. Muck can’t quite bring himself to own up to Saffi, so decides to tell Bob what has happened first. On his way to tell Bob, Muck overhears Anish telling Saffi how proud he is of her statue. Muck panics and ends up damaging the elephant more.

programme.title: Fýra brúdleyp og ein jarðarferð
programme.desc: Tann smædni Charles er at kalla gamal drongur, til hann í einum av brúdleypunum hjá vinfolkunum knappliga hittir dreymagentuna, amerikonsku Carrie. Men kærleikin er ikki so at flættast við, og tey bæði skulu í mangt brúdleypið og eina jarðarferð, áðrenn tey kunnu fáa hvørt annað.Leikarar: Charles: Hugh Grant, Carrie: Andie MacDowell og Fiona: Kristin Scott Thomas.Prestur: Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Palli Halaleysi
programme.desc: Birgitta og familjan eru farin í summarhús, og frá bondanum fær hon ein fittan, lítlan kettling ? við ongum hala. Birgitta og Palli verða skjott bestu vinir, men í illveðrinum dettur Palli í ánna, og fer rekandi avstað allan vegin inn í býin. Hann er so bangin og leingist illa eftir síni Birgittu, men so hittir hann Maju. Maja er ein blíð og týð ketta, sum tekur væl ímoti Palla og vísir honum runt í býnum. Har møta tey mongum øðrum kettum ? nakrar eru fittar, og nakrar ikki so fittar, serliga ikki Mons, sum er rættiliga ráðaríkur. Hoast Palli hevur tað gott saman við Maju og hinum kettunum, leingist honum framvegis heim ? og eftir Birgittu. Men um tað eydnast honum, fer filmurin at vísa okkum.

programme.title: Le Crillon : Noël au balcon
programme.desc: Ses fenetres donnent directement sur la celèbre place de la Concorde. Parmi les douze palaces parisiens, le Crillon est l’un des plus mythiques. Installe dans un bâtiment du 18e siècle, classe monument historique, cet hôtel d’exception a recemment accueilli l’Équipe de France de football, venue saluer ses supporters au retour de la Coupe du Monde. Pour celebrer le passage à la nouvelle annee, l’hôtel s’est à nouveau mis sur son 31.

programme.desc: Une emission qui traite de lactualite people et musicale. Elle permet de faire decouvrir les dessous du show business avec des clips, des interviews de stars, des reportages, les sorties cinema et DVD, lagenda spectacle, la meteo et lhoroscope.

programme.title: Le mag du samedi
programme.desc: Le mag du samedi invite à decouvrir les coulisses d’evenements spectaculaires, des success stories entrepreneuriales comme des immersions dans le quotidien de ceux qui participent activement à construire l’avenir de notre pays. C’est un magazine sur la societe d’aujourd’hui, celle qui nous inspire et nous fait rever.

programme.title: 66 minutes : grand format
programme.desc: Reportages, portraits, enquetes, 66 Minutes : grand format explore lactualite avec un reportage sur un fait divers, un phenomène de societe ou un evenement de lactualite internationale.

programme.title: Meteo
programme.desc: La meteo de M6 vous fera decouvrir un lieu en France symbolique du derèglement climatique ou des solutions apparues pour le combattre. Sur place, Gennifer Demey, Cali Morales et Stephanie Duval vous expliqueront les causes de ces perturbations climatiques et leurs consequences sur les paysages, la faune, la flore et les habitants de ces endroits de France concernes par le sujet.

programme.title: Le 1245
programme.desc: Les nouvelles les plus recentes, en temps reel, concernant la politique, lactualite mondiale, lactualite sportive, la technologie, la culture, les affaires judiciaires, les voyages et la meteo sur la chaine M6, pour la periode de la mi-journee.

programme.title: Scènes de menages
programme.desc: Votre couple vous desole ? Vous vous lamentez de vivre seul ? Scènes de Menages va vous aider à relativiser !

programme.title: Nanny McPhee
programme.desc: Depuis la disparition de son epouse, M. Brown a bien du mal à soccuper de ses sept enfants. De laîne à la petite dernière, tous se conduisent si mal que la maisonnee est devenue un enfer. Accapare par son travail au funerarium et harcele par lhorrible Tante Adelaïde qui menace de lui retirer son aide financière sil ne se remarie pas très rapidement, M. Brown nattend plus quun miracle. Surgit alors une effrayante et mysterieuse gouvernante qui propose ses services à M. Brown : Nanny McPhee.

programme.title: Nanny McPhee et le Big Bang
programme.desc: Isabel Green est accablee par les soucis. Depuis que son mari est parti à la guerre, elle doit gerer seule la ferme familiale, ses trois enfants dissipes, ses deux neveux insupportables et son envahissant beau-frère. Heureusement, Nanny McPhee apparaît et met en place des règles strictes à meme de venir à bout des enfants les plus recalcitrants.

programme.title: La roue de la fortune
programme.desc: De nombreux candidats vont tenter leur chance pour denicher les mots et expressions caches, tout en esperant decrocher les plus gros gains offerts par la roue. Mais attention, ils devront eviter la redoutable banqueroute et les autres pièges qu’elle reserve. Chaque jour, les participants se donneront à fond pour vivre des moments palpitants et atteindre la finale, où ils pourront remporter jusqu’à 20 000 euros ou un voyage de reve à l’autre bout du monde.

programme.title: Le maillon faible
programme.desc: Le Maillon faible est un jeu base sur des questions elementaires de culture generale, la vitesse et la strategie. Neuf candidats qui ne se connaissent pas repondent à tour de rôle aux questions du presentateur.

programme.title: Meteo
programme.desc: La meteo de M6 vous fera decouvrir un lieu en France symbolique du derèglement climatique ou des solutions apparues pour le combattre. Sur place, Gennifer Demey, Cali Morales et Stephanie Duval vous expliqueront les causes de ces perturbations climatiques et leurs consequences sur les paysages, la faune, la flore et les habitants de ces endroits de France concernes par le sujet.

programme.title: Le 1945
programme.desc: Le 1945 est un journal televise français diffuse depuis le 7 septembre 2009 sur M6 du lundi au dimanche à 19h 45. Le journal se positionne dès ses debuts comme un journal de proximite, privilegiant lactualite nationale à lactualite internationale.

programme.title: Scènes de menages
programme.desc: Votre couple vous desole ? Vous vous lamentez de vivre seul ? Scènes de Menages va vous aider à relativiser !

programme.title: Les Bodins en folie
programme.desc: Pour feter leurs 30 ans de carrière, Maria et Christian Bodin quittent leur ferme et debarquent à Paris pour realiser un reve fou : un grand spectacle aux Folies Bergères ! Entre souvenirs attendrissants de leurs debuts modestes et leur entree fracassante dans la capitale, le duo enchaîne gags, sketches et situations improbables.

programme.title: Bienvenue chez les Bodins
programme.desc: À cause de sa maladresse habituelle, Christian Bodin a mis le feu à l’eglise de son village. Tandis que les chaînes TV couvrent l’evenement, les villageois se retrouvent sans eglise et sans clocher, bref : sans repères ! Il faut faire quelque chose. Et heureusement Maria et Christian ont une idee ! Puisque la mère et le fils ont sillonne les routes et les plateaux teles de France, leur repertoire est desormais bien rempli : humoristes, acteurs, comediens, chanteurs.

programme.title: La grande histoire des Bodins
programme.desc: De Descartes, la ville de leurs debuts, aux plus grands Zeniths de France, retrouvez Les Bodin’s sur les routes et en coulisses pour decouvrir qui se cache derrière Maria et Christian Bodin. Une grande histoire, racontee par la grande famille des Bodin’s et les personnalites avec qui ils ont collabore, pour feter comme il se doit les 30 ans des Bodin’s !

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: Étienne Bruet et Safet Rastoder vous emmènent à Arjeplog en Laponie pour visite un centre technique où les constructeurs automobiles testent leurs prototypes dans des conditions extremes. Ils rendront egalement visite à Éric Gallardo, proprietaire d’un circuit sur lac gele, où se rendent des particuliers mais aussi des pilotes de Formule 1 pour s’exercer à la conduite sur glace. Simon et Étienne en profiteront pour tester l’Alpine A290 et la future berline d’Alpine, l’A390 sur un lac gele.

programme.title: Scènes de menages
programme.desc: Votre couple vous desole ? Vous vous lamentez de vivre seul ? Scènes de Menages va vous aider à relativiser !

programme.title: Zone interdite
programme.desc: Arrivee d’un bebe, ados qui grandissent, teletravail : certains changements de vie nous amènent bien souvent à revoir notre projet de logement. Mais comment faire face à la hausse des prix de l’immobilier et la flambee des taux d’interet ? Faute de pouvoir demenager, certains Français decident de repousser les murs ou repenser entièrement leur maison ! Relooking total, une pièce ou un etage en plus : comment des familles arrivent-elles à creer un nouveau foyer sans demenager ?

programme.title: Enquete exclusive
programme.desc: Mini-etat insulaire d’Asie du Sud-Est, Singapour est le pays de tous les records : meilleur niveau de vie, meilleur système de sante, meilleure education, technologie la plus en pointe, plus longue esperance de vie, criminalite la plus basse… À Singapour, la science est au cœur du quotidien des habitants : ce sont des robots qui servent au restaurant, s’occupent des malades à l’hôpital ou vont faire les courses au supermarche. Cest aujourd’hui le seul au monde où l’on peut manger de la viande artificielle, fabriquee à partir de cellules souches en laboratoire.Singapour, c’est aussi la securite poussee à l’extreme. Tout est sous contrôle et les règles restrictives sont innombrables : interdit de mâcher du chewing-gum, de fumer dans la rue, de traverser hors des clous, de jeter un papier par terre, de parler dans le metro ou meme de se deplacer tout nu chez soi. La censure y est quasi generalisee. Les opposants politiques sont harceles par la justice. Les minorites sexuelles surveillees. Et consommer de la drogue mène tout droit en prison, voire à une execution dans certains cas. Car Singapour applique la peine de mort. Après une pause pendant le confinement mondial, les pendaisons ont repris.L’equipe d’Enquete Exclusive a suivi la vie quotidienne des Singapouriens, rythmee par la technologie ultra moderne et les interdictions. À l’ecole, à l’hôpital, dans les marches et les rues, il y a des cameras de videosurveillance partout. Nous avons aussi rencontre ceux qui ont subi l’extreme severite du regime : un ancien prisonnier qui a passe vingt-cinq ans derrière les barreaux pour des simples delits, puis condamne à des châtiments corporels. Ou encore des militants pro democratie qui revent de plus de liberte et qui finissent incarceres à leur tour.Enfin, nous avons filme une famille dont le père attend dans le couloir de la mort son execution. Son crime : avoir ete en possession de trente-cinq grammes d’heroïne, là où la loi condamne automatiquement à la peine capitale toute personne en possedant plus de quinze grammes.Singapour, le meilleur des mondes ou un etat prison ? Enquete sur un pays hors norme.

programme.title: Enquete exclusive
programme.desc: C’est la plus grande megalopole du monde. Quarante millions d’habitants s’y croisent chaque jour. Mais la nuit, Tokyo se metamorphose. On y croise des personnages hors-norme qui racontent un Japon mysterieux et inaccessible aux etrangers. Un univers où sexpriment les traditions, mais aussi les failles et les travers de la societe nippone.À Kabukicho, le quartier chaud de la capitale, le nouveau concept à la mode ce sont les clubs d’hosts”. Ces jeunes hommes sont payes pour tenir compagnie et flirter avec les clientes. Seule limite : le sexe y est interdit ! Un etonnant business lie à l’immense solitude des Japonais. Le metier a beau etre lucratif, les jeunes « hosts » sont uses par cette vie nocturne et les quantites astronomiques d’alcool qu’ils ingurgitent tous les soirs.Tout aussi deroutant pour les occidentaux : le phenomène des « Idols », des centaines de groupes de chanteuses et de danseuses, très sexy, idolâtrees par les Japonais qui les perçoivent comme des petites amies virtuelles.La nuit, certaines rues de Tokyo prennent un visage plus sombre. C’est là que l’on rencontre les « Toyoko Kids », des adolescents fugueurs, sans domicile fixe, qui vivent dans la rue et se retrouvent livres à eux-memes. Asuka est l’une des personnalites les plus respectees des nuits tokyoïtes. Elle est “Mama-San”, une heritière de la tradition des Geisha. Elle gère d’une main de maître le bar à hôtesse le plus select de la ville : le rendez-vous des hommes d’affaires riches et influents. Exceptionnellement, elle a accepte de nous reveler une partie de ses secrets.Adrien, lui, est le Français qui organise les soirees les plus decadentes de la ville. Dans son bar, les Japonais se lâchent en toute liberte et sans aucun tabou !

programme.title: Enquete exclusive
programme.desc: New York simpose comme la capitale mondiale de Noël, attirant sept millions de visiteurs en quete de feerie. La demesure règne partout : à Brooklyn, certains depensent 25 000 dollars pour illuminer leurs maisons. Manhattan deploie son sapin mythique pare de 50 000 ampoules, tandis que 30 000 Pères Noël envahissent Times Square. Entre tradition et delire festif, la ville pousse lexperience jusquaux croisières, jacuzzi bouillonnant face aux gratte-ciels illumines.

programme.title: Bruno Walter | Portrait
programme.desc: The film portrays Bruno Walter (1876-1962), one of the most important conductors of the 20th century. The Italian biographer Michele Selvini speaks about the musician Bruno Walter who formed the musical life of the capitals of Europe and the United States over a period of 60 years. But so far not published film material also shows a different, not so known Bruno Walter as a private man.

programme.title: Mozart: Piano Concerto no. 12 - Vladimir Ashkenazy
programme.desc: The 13-part Mozart on Tour series chronicles the journey of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart across Europe. This broadcast features the first three episodes of this series, taking us to London, Mantua, and Bologna. In the first episode, Vladimir Ashkenazy performs as both soloist and conductor in Mozart’s Piano Concerto No. 12, KV 414, accompanied by the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra. The second episode features soloist Heidrun Holtmann as she performs Mozart’s Piano Concerto No. 1, KV 37, and Piano Concerto No. 4, KV 41. Holtmann is accompanied by the Orchestra della Radiotelevisione della Svizzera, led by Marc Andreae. In the third episode, Andreae and his orchestra return for a performance of Mozarts Piano Concerto No. 5, KV 175, featuring Malcolm Frager as the soloist.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Vi undersoker en upptackt i en slovensk grotta 1995 av ett ben som snidats 10 000 år innan manniskor nådde den regionen. Darefter visar sig en enkel svart klacksko som stalls ut i ett tyskt museum vara en hogteknologisk maskin utformad for att utfora en nastan omojlig uppgift. Slutligen avslojar vi den morka historien om en lila adelsten prydd med silverormar.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: Under kejsar Trajanus vaxte romarriket till sin storsta utbredning och tackte stora delar av Mellanostern. Hur lyckades Rom erovra dessa oknar? Vi foljer arkeologer nar de graver ut en begravd romersk stad och stiger ner i en utsokt grav i Jordanien, dyker ner i ett nedsankt tempel och utforskar den ikoniska klippstaden Petra, for att avsloja hur Rom holl ett fast grepp om sitt nya territorium.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: Romarriket dominerade miljontals kilometer land – och hav. Vilka hemligheter drev dess styre i fyra århundraden? Vi foljer arkeologer nar de dyker ner under vattnet for att grava ut ett nyupptackt romerskt skeppsvrak, utforskar sedan forsvunna hamnar i Neapelbukten och rekonstruerar och tavlar med två antika romerska skepp for att avsloja det maritima herravalde som forankrade ett imperium.

programme.title: To Catch A Smuggler
programme.desc: JFK CBP stoppar en passagerare som reser från Trinidad med konserverad, tropisk frukt och upptacker ett vitt pulver. I Miamis postlokaler hittar CBP små glasflaskor med misstankt innehåll och testar dem for att se om det ar ett farligt bedovningsmedel som anvands vid dejt/våldtakt. HSI gor en bevakad leverans med forhoppningen att gripa smugglaren. På LAX frågar CBP ut passagerare som tros vara offer for sexhandel och aktenskapsbluffar.

programme.title: To Catch A Smuggler
programme.desc: En ensam passagerare som anlander till LAX från Nigeria berattar en misstankt historia. MIA lantbruksavdelning undersoker allt från rått kott till jakttrofeer. Slutligen nosar de ratt på en forsandelse med ett mystiskt gront pulver.

programme.title: Europa från ovan
programme.desc: Denna spektakulara luftfard over Europa avslojar julen på ett helt nytt satt, från ett blandande ljuståg langs Englands kust till en extraordinar logistisk prestation på Tomtens postkontor. Darefter korsar vi kontinenten for att bevittna en fantastisk monsterparad, ett alpint jattefyrverkeri samt Finlands ikoniska renhjordar.

programme.title: Arctic Ascent with Alex Honnold
programme.desc: Expertklattraren Alex Honnold inleder sin forsta Gronlandsexpedition i syfte att bestiga en 1350 meter hog havsklippa.

programme.title: Arctic Ascent with Alex Honnold
programme.desc: Alex och teamet drabbas av isfall nar de som de forsta någonsin forsoker bestiga en 450 meter hog klippvagg.

programme.title: Arctic Ascent with Alex Honnold
programme.desc: Den sista etappen av den episka Gronlandsexpeditionen tar sin borjan. Alex och de andra expertklattrarna inleder sin klattring uppfor en av varldens storsta klippvaggar och upptacker att detta kan bli den farligaste klattring de nånsin forsokt sig på. Samtidigt får forskarteamet ovantade resultat från en av Gronlands viktigaste glaciarer.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Strax efter att ha lyft från Honolulu kampar piloterna på TransAir Flight 810 for att hålla sitt fraktplan i luften. Snart har de inget annat val an att nodlanda sin Boeing 737 i Stilla havet. Tack vare en dramatisk raddningsinsats av kustbevakningen overlever båda piloterna kraschen. De ar overtygade om att båda motorerna havererade samtidigt. Men nar vraket dyker upp ur djupet berattar bevisen en annan historia.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Air Tahoma Flight 185, ett sent fraktflyg från Memphis, ar på vag mot Cincinnati. Men bara några kilometer från flygplatsen – och inom synhåll från landningsbanan – faller den dubbla turbopropellern från himlen och stortar ned på en golfbana. Det ar tydligt att båda motorerna slocknade fore nedslaget. Och mysteriet blir bara djupare nar utredarna upptacker att det fortfarande fanns gott om bransle ombord.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Efter att ha lyft från Jakarta i Indonesien - den dodligaste flygplatsen i varlden - svanger Sriwijaya Air Flight 182 plotsligt hårt åt vanster, flyger i en spiral och stortar med nosen ned i Javasjon. Den kraftiga kraschen pulveriserar planet. Och nar utredarna borjar grava i flygdatan upptacker de en mangd dodliga defekter som på något satt har gått igenom systemet.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Ett turbopropellerplan ar på vag ner i tat dimma over Luxemburg nar något går fruktansvart fel. Luxair Flight 50 kraschar bara några kilometer från landningsbanan. Utredarna står handfallna nar de inte hittar något fel på någon av motorerna. Men nar de analyserar mystiska ljud som fångats upp av cockpitens rostinspelare upptacker de ett idiotsakert system som ar allt annat an det.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Under en transportflygning från Edinburgh till Belfast och bara några minuter efter start kraschar Loganair Flight 670A i Nordsjon, dodar båda piloterna och lamnar utredarna oforstående. Rostinspelaren i cockpit ger den forsta riktiga ledtråden nar utredarna avslojar det mystiska sambandet mellan turboproppens avisningssystem, en nattlig storm och en katastrofal tvåmotorig brand.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: China Eastern Airlines 583 ar på en nattflygning från Peking till Los Angeles nar planet dyker och stiger så kraftigt att två passagerare dodas och 150 skadas. Besattningen lyckas omdirigera flygplanet till en topphemlig bas for US Air Force på en avlagsen o i Alaska. Utredarna hittar inga spår av turbulens och sokandet efter orsaken till den dodliga berg-och-dalbanan i skyn fortsatter.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Året ar 1985 – det dodligaste året inom civilflyget – och ett DC-9-pendlarplan kraschar sekunder efter start från Milwaukee. Det ar upp till utredarna att lugna allmanheten. De upptacker snart att en nyckelkomponent i motorerna ar benagen att gå sonder, men det berattar bara en del av historien. Det ar det som utredarna inte hor på cockpitens rostinspelare som i slutandan avslojar vad som gick fel.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Ett C-130 brandplan kraschar under bekampning av en australisk skogsbrand och dodar alla tre besattningsmedlemmarna vid nedslaget. Utredarna stalls infor sina karriarers storsta utmaning och måste faststalla orsaken till kraschen – inom en aktiv brandzon. En ogonvittnesvideo avslojar en viktig aspekt av flygningen, som pekar på en plotslig vaderhandelse som visade sig vara omojlig att overvinna.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Två flygplan kolliderar i luften over sodra Tyskland, och katastrofen bevittnas av mangder av manniskor på marken. Vrakdelarna lamnar inga tvivel om att planen splittrades i luften. Men utredarna står infor ett mysterium. Hur kunde de båda planen hamna på samma hojd samtidigt? Och vad hande med de många felsakerhetsanordningar som designats for att forhindra en kollision i luften?

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Efter en omfattande ombyggnad går tre Airborne Express-piloter ombord på ett modifierat DC-8-lastflygplan for en rutinmassig testflygning som slutar i katastrof. Vrakdelarna visar utredarna att planet traffade en bergssida i Virginia i ett stycke. Och nar de pusslar ihop vad som gick fel upptacker de en katastrofal serie av fel som domde planet till undergång innan det kom upp från marken.

programme.title: Titanic: The Digital Resurrection
programme.desc: Ett banbrytande projekt leder fram till den forsta hogupplosta 3D-modellen av Titanic och den grundligaste undersokningen av forlisningen till dags dato.

programme.title: Edge of the Unknown
programme.desc: Alex Honnold blev varldens mest beromde alpinist nar han besteg granitvaggen i Yosemite utan rep. Men hur forberedde sig Alex infor att gora det omojliga? Han och Tommy Caldwell for till Marocko och pressade sig till det yttersta på lika hoga vaggar, som kulminerade i Alex replosa klattring. Detta ar Alex outtrottliga, slitsamma process for att forvandla drommen till verklighet.

programme.title: Incas: The Rise and Fall
programme.desc: På mindre an ett sekel expanderade inkafolket till ett vidstrackt imperium, men hemligheterna bakom deras snabba uppgång forblev dolda i århundraden. Med hjalp av avancerad vetenskap och fantastiska 3D-rekonstruktioner avslojar vi hur den store kejsaren Tupac Yupanqu drev på imperiets storsta expansion. Från Cuzco underkuvade han rivaler, byggde upp en maktig administration, utvidgade ett omfattande vagnat och skapade ett unikt bokforingssystem med knutna snoren.

programme.title: Vikings: The Rise and Fall
programme.desc: “Silkesvagen” oppnade upp en handelsvag for skandinaverna i Öster. På jakt efter fler rikedomar attackerade vikingarna – i oster kallade ”ruser” – Konstantinopel år 860. ”Ruserna” blev ett permanent och fruktat inslag i det bysantinska riket.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Eleverna står infor sitt sista och mest avgorande prov – en ikonisk luftstrid man mot man mot sina instruktorer. For att klara provet måste de anvanda alla fardigheter de lart sig under den avancerade fasen av utbildningen. Med bara några dagar kvar till examen borjar eleverna oroa sig for om de kommer att accepteras till en av de mest eftertraktade platserna i den amerikanska militaren.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord och Bjoern slår sig samman nar en lastbil riskerar att valta nedfor en backe. Nar lastbilen balanserar på kanten planerar Bjoern att klattra upp på en stege for att sakra en rem, men Thord hindrar honom. På en isig bergsvag ger sig Domenic och Thords dotter Malin ivag for att undsatta en skåpbil, men de når inte fram. Thord ansluter sig till dem i en raddningsaktion som får honom att inse att gransen mellan liv och dod ar hårfin. I norr kallar Jo Roger in forstarkning for en trippelraddning av en lastbil, en skåpbil och en borrigg.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: På en spannande resa genom Spaniens anmarkningsvarda tekniska underverk får vi en inblick i den banbrytande teknik som for Barcelonas Sagrada Familia narmare fardigstallandet. Darefter avslojar vi hemligheterna bakom Sevillas rekordstora solskydd i tra och besoker en skyskrapa som tycks trotsa tyngdkraften. Slutligen får vi bevittna den intrikata restaureringen av en 2 000 år gammal romersk teater.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: På en avlagsen o i sydostra Alaskas iskalla vatten bor en grupp otroliga manniskor som lever av naturen.

programme.title: Northwoods Survival
programme.desc: Margot står infor en rad åskvader och gor en sista kraftanstrangning for att fardigstalla sitt dromhus i Yukon. Billy bygger en grill i vildmarken – det sista steget i hans mål att forvandla sin enkla bostad till det perfekta vildmarkshemmet. Med sommaren precis runt hornet vidtar Matty åtgarder for att uppgradera sitt boende vid vattnet. Och Emilie och Gilbert kampar mot snon under den sena sasongen nar de skyndar sig att fardigstalla sin stuga i vildmarken innan några mycket speciella gaster anlander.

programme.title: Northwoods Survival
programme.desc: Nar temperaturen sjunker ar Margot på jakt efter lite ”varme” – det sista steget for att gora hennes hem i Northwoods beboeligt. I hopp om att få lite lyx till sitt hem i skogen ger Billy en gammal uthusbyggnad nytt liv. Emilie och Gilbert får sitt mod och sin relation provad nar de tavlar om att fardigstalla sin stuga. Och Matty tar den okanda Newfoundland-vintern på allvar nar han forsoker slutfora ett ambitiost nytt ”Hillbilly”-byggnadsprojekt.

programme.title: Det vilda norden
programme.desc: Norges hav ar fodelseplats for planetens mest mytomspunna civilisation: vikingarna. Dessa krigare reste over enorma fjordar, upp for kusterna och besteg enorma berg. Kusternas skatter får liv, från Oslos fjord i soder till den rika ogruppen Lofoten i norr.

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav: Djupdykning
programme.desc: I sekler seglade skepp over varldshaven fyllda med silver, guld och adelstenar. Pirater och stormar ledde inte sallan till att skepp forliste. Idag kan modern teknik utforska havsbottnen i jakt på de forlorade skeppen och tack vare kraftfulla datorer kan dessa data omvandlas till 3D-grafik som gor det mojligt att granska vraken och dess dyrbara last in i minsta detalj och från varje vinkel.

programme.title: Dranerade hav: Underjordens skurkar
programme.desc: Pirater, gangsters och mansklighetens avskum slukades alla av havet. Den senaste tekniken avslojar havsbottnens grymma hemligheter.

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav - samlingsavsnitt
programme.desc: Karibien omfattar hundratals oar och rev, men vad som gjorde det till en så skrackinjagande plats var dess lagloshet. I takt med att handeln frodades gjorde piraternas affarer det med. Kaptenerna Svartskagg, Kidd och Morgan plundrade sig fram genom dessa vatten. Nu avslojar spannande nya upptackter den sanna berattelsen bakom denna okanda piratkust och några av dess mest skurkaktiga lycksokare.

programme.title: Pirates: Behind the Legends
programme.desc: Sir Francis Drake, en hjalte for engelsmannen, kand som The Dragon for spanjorerna. Från sina resor som slavhandlare till sina brutala attacker på spanska kolonialstader fortsatter Drakes status att stiga med de oandliga stulna byten han tar med sig till drottning Elizabeth 1. Varldsomseglingen ar hojdpunkten i hans karriar och befaster hans stallning i historien som varldens mest okanda pirat.

programme.title: Pirates: Behind the Legends
programme.desc: Grace OMalley, Piratdrottningen av Irland. OMalley foddes i en sjofararfamilj och trotsade konskonventionerna och blev den mest fruktade och respekterade ledaren på land och till sjoss. Tack vare aktenskap kunde hon forhandla till sig en politisk position och sakra landområden efter ett mote med drottning Elizabeth. OMalleys vag från pirat till ledare gick via krigarens svard och kvinnans mod.

programme.title: Pirates: Behind the Legends
programme.desc: Engelsmannen som blev algerisk pirat. Från en blygsam borjan som fattig sjoman trottnar John Ward på slitet i den engelska flottan. Vid 50 års ålder påborjar han sin anmarkningsvarda uppstigning från småpirat till ett okant hot i Medelhavet, konverterar till islam och blir en skyddad harskare over det tunisiska imperiet.

programme.title: Pirates: Behind the Legends
programme.desc: Henry Morgans karriar stracker sig bortom den alskade rom som han ar synonym med. Morgan ar en briljant strateg och tar manniskor, skatter och spanska kolonialstader utan pardon. Morgan seglar mycket nara gransen for vad som ar lagligt och hans tid som pirat bestraffas med en kort tid i Towern i London foljt av en befordran till att bli guvernor på Jamaica.

programme.title: Pirates: Behind the Legends
programme.desc: Kapten Kidd, skattjagaren. En skotte som bryter sig in i New York-societetens hogre skikt och blir sponsrad som kapare. Nar de legitima skatterna i Roda havet inte går att finna, forvandlas Kidd från piratjagare till pirat. Som impopular kapten jagar han frenetiskt skatter och status fram till sin odesdigra rattegång dar han anklagas for mord.

programme.title: Pirates: Behind the Legends
programme.desc: Svartskagg; holjt i myter och intriger, ett namn synonymt med kaos. Hans stulna flaggskepp Queen Annes Revenge kryssar genom Karibien och får fart med en brokig besattning av pirater som soker jamlikhet, aventyr och skatter. Nar han lyckas blockera Charleston i South Carolina och kraver medicin till sin syfilissjuka besattning slutar jakten på Svartskagg med en blodig strid.

programme.title: Pirates: Behind the Legends
programme.desc: Den okanda piratstaden Nassau kommer snart att skakas av engelsmannens hårda tag mot laglosheten i Karibien. Det ar har som Anne Bonny overger ett konventionellt liv for att bli kvinnlig pirat tillsammans med sin alskare Calico Jack. De får snart sallskap av Mary Read och bildar en besvarlig trio tills de tillfångatas av piratjagare och stalls infor ratta for sjoroveri.

programme.title: Pirates: Behind the Legends
programme.desc: Bartholomew Roberts alias Black Bart, den mest framgångsrika piraten under guldåldern, med en flotta på 450 stulna skepp. Från sin enkla borjan som walesisk sjoman blir Roberts snabbt kapten på ett piratskepp och visar prov på sitt skarpsinniga kaptenskap genom att skriva ner en piratkod. Hans piratdåd får nastan handeln i Vastindien att stanna upp tills han jagas av den engelska kronan.

programme.title: Colosseum: Rise and Fall
programme.desc: En av de mest kraftfulla symbolerna for romersk makt doljer fortfarande många mysterier – Colosseum. Samtidigt som nya arkeologiska fynd i Colosseum avslojar den enorma omfattningen av den massiva strukturen och hur den såg ut vid invigningen, avslojar nya undersokningar i Italien det sanna ursprunget till det storsta monumentet som byggdes av det romerska imperiet.

programme.title: Colosseum: Rise and Fall
programme.desc: Banbrytande forskning om Colosseums historia avslojar hur Roms kejsare anvande monumentet som ett politiskt verktyg. Samtidigt graver arkeologer under Colosseum och avslojar den verkliga omfattningen av de romerska spelen, upptacker gladiatorernas hemligheter och graver fram resterna av forntida djur som slaktades inne i Roms mest ikoniska landmarke.

programme.title: Colosseum: Rise and Fall
programme.desc: Colosseum och dess gladiatorspel var en symbol for Roms enorma makt och stod kvar i over ett sekel fram till borjan av slutet på det romerska imperiet. Nya fynd som gjorts på platsen och ytterligare undersokningar av ruiner i Österrike, Tunisien och Rom pekar på ett imperium i kris och avslojar den chockerande roll som Colosseum spelade i Roms nedgång och fall.

programme.title: Rome Underground
programme.desc: I ett extraordinart aventyr under den eviga stadens gator får vi bevittna hur ett gigantiskt tunnelbaneprojekt och en extraordinar arkeologisk utgravning utvecklas parallellt. Nar arbetarna graver en 26 kilometer lång tunnelbanelinje under det historiska Rom gor de några av de mest anmarkningsvarda arkeologiska upptackterna i modern tid. Med hjalp av avancerad modellering och 3D-animation vacks Roms begravda forflutna till liv.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Vi undersoker ryktena om att en manniskoskalle i British Museum, huggen ur en enda kvartskristall, besitter overnaturliga krafter. Darefter avslojar vi den morka historien bakom en spikforsedd, svardkladd stol från det forna Kina. Slutligen graver vi djupare i en mystisk rund tavla med kilskrift som hittades i ett lange begravt bibliotek i den forsvunna assyriska staden Nineve.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Nu går eleverna in i andra fasen av luftstridsutbildningen – defensiv strid. Har satts deras formågor på prov nar de ska undvika att bli nedskjutna av erfarna instruktorer. Den fysiska påfrestningen blir for mycket for en av eleverna, medan en annan vacklar nar tidigare misslyckanden gor sig påminda. Allt står på spel.

programme.title: The New Air Force One: Flying Fortress
programme.desc: Nya Air Force One: Flying Fortress foljer konstruktionen av det nya presidentplanet och hur det forvandlats till en topphemlig kommandocentral.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: I en haftig storm tar Thord itu med en lastbilschauffor som vagrar att raddas och en underpresterande larling som hela tiden staller till det. I norr tvingar det extrema vadret två snoplogar av vagen. Den ena har kort in i en stenmur och den andra ar begravd djupt i ett dike. Nar snon samlas på vagarna ar Jo Roger och Raido under press att forsoka få dem att fungera igen.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Vi avslojar några av varldens varsta byggkatastrofer och utforskar en kollapsad italiensk stormarknad, brander på nojesparker, en katastrofal tunnelkollaps i Indien som fångade arbetare, Kanadas problemtyngda spårvag och ett stadiontak som blåste bort i en orkan. Senare tittar vi på hur husbyggande har blivit felaktigt på grund av bly.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: På en spannande resa genom Spaniens anmarkningsvarda tekniska underverk får vi en inblick i den banbrytande teknik som for Barcelonas Sagrada Familia narmare fardigstallandet. Darefter avslojar vi hemligheterna bakom Sevillas rekordstora solskydd i tra och besoker en skyskrapa som tycks trotsa tyngdkraften. Slutligen får vi bevittna den intrikata restaureringen av en 2 000 år gammal romersk teater.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget från ovan
programme.desc: WWII: Secrets From Above skildrar det andra varldskrigets mest hapnadsvackande handelser ur ett helt nytt perspektiv. Geno matt matcha fangslande bilder från fronten, sallan visade filmklipp och fantastiska flygrekognosceringsbilder och deras ursprungliga platser återskapar serien vitala slag, djarva bombrader och utvecklingen av varldens forsta massforstorelsevapen.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Reborn as AI: My Sons Story
programme.desc: After an American high school student loses his life in a mass shooting, his parents use AI to create an avatar of him, both to speak out against gun violence and to help them recover from the trauma.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN
programme.desc: We cycle the Noto Peninsula, hit by a major earthquake in 2024. We visit a temporary morning market where people who lost their shops sell goods, and a salt-maker keeping traditional methods alive.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Todays theme: Cleaning. More than a chore, its a way to calm the mind. Spaces, products, and system designs to encourage cleaning - explore a unique Japanese aesthetic and the potential of cleaning.

programme.title: Lets Enjoy MATH with Barky the Dog
programme.desc: Numbler erases a part of a cake delivery memo, resulting in the delivery of four cakes instead of one. Barky solves the mystery by showing the difference between ordinal numbers and cardinal numbers.

programme.title: TAKE TECH
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: History Uncovered
programme.desc: Starting with Ieyasu, the Tokugawa Shoguns made clever use of falconry beyond mere hunting. Uncover their deep connection with these majestic birds.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history and culture. This episode looks at words related to a play and acting. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: At the Niihama Taiko Matsuri, teams of around 150 people carry taikodai: three-tonne parade floats housing a huge taiko drum. They compete to give the most powerful synchronized performance.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: 80 Years and Beyond
programme.desc: Japan inflicted deep wounds in World War Two but suffered two atomic bombs. The people in this program, from high schoolers to historians, use this dark chapter in history to build a brighter future.

programme.title: BOSAI:Science that Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: Japans snow is a big draw for tourists, but snow and ice can also pose dangers to drivers. Well look at some Japanese technology being developed to prevent whiteouts and accidents on slippery roads.

programme.title: DESIGN MUSEUM JAPAN
programme.desc: Miyanaga Aiko (Contemporary artist) visits Kyoto. The Mincho font, drawn by hand in around 1990, evokes 350-year-old hand-carved woodblocks, made to print Buddhist sutras.

programme.title: Darwins Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Thailands Asian openbill storks have no time to feel squeamish about their daily diet. After all, their beaks must move with deft precision to extract the soft flesh inside...of 200 snails each!

programme.title: TAKE TECH
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN
programme.desc: We cycle the Noto Peninsula, hit by a major earthquake in 2024. We visit a temporary morning market where people who lost their shops sell goods, and a salt-maker keeping traditional methods alive.

programme.title: History Uncovered
programme.desc: Starting with Ieyasu, the Tokugawa Shoguns made clever use of falconry beyond mere hunting. Uncover their deep connection with these majestic birds.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history and culture. This episode looks at words related to a play and acting. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.desc: At the Niihama Taiko Matsuri, teams of around 150 people carry taikodai: three-tonne parade floats housing a huge taiko drum. They compete to give the most powerful synchronized performance.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: 80 Years and Beyond
programme.desc: Japan inflicted deep wounds in World War Two but suffered two atomic bombs. The people in this program, from high schoolers to historians, use this dark chapter in history to build a brighter future.

programme.title: BOSAI:Science that Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: Japans snow is a big draw for tourists, but snow and ice can also pose dangers to drivers. Well look at some Japanese technology being developed to prevent whiteouts and accidents on slippery roads.

programme.desc: Miyanaga Aiko (Contemporary artist) visits Kyoto. The Mincho font, drawn by hand in around 1990, evokes 350-year-old hand-carved woodblocks, made to print Buddhist sutras.

programme.title: Reborn as AI: My Sons Story
programme.desc: After an American high school student loses his life in a mass shooting, his parents use AI to create an avatar of him, both to speak out against gun violence and to help them recover from the trauma.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Barakan Discovers HAGI
programme.desc: Yoshida Shoin was an educator whose students played key roles in Japans modernization. He died at 29, but his ideals still live on 160 years later. Peter Barakan visits Shoins hometown of Hagi.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Darwins Amazing Animals

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Kyoto in the autumn: the old capital is even more beautiful when dressed in fall colors. Witness the contemplative and quiet beauty of Kyoto through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Lets Enjoy MATH with Barky the Dog
programme.desc: Numbler erases a part of a cake delivery memo, resulting in the delivery of four cakes instead of one. Barky solves the mystery by showing the difference between ordinal numbers and cardinal numbers.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: A Ghanaian entrepreneur and resident of Japan launched an online radio station as a way of giving back to the community. The project is inspiring some young Africans to pursue their own dreams.

programme.title: IMPACTS: Climates Change the World
programme.desc: Dengue fever cases worldwide have risen to 30 times their levels 20 years ago, with global warming connected to infection spread by mosquitoes, especially in countries such as the Philippines.

programme.title: DESIGN MUSEUM JAPAN
programme.desc: Miyanaga Aiko (Contemporary artist) visits Kyoto. The Mincho font, drawn by hand in around 1990, evokes 350-year-old hand-carved woodblocks, made to print Buddhist sutras.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Austrian fashion designer Edwina Horl Ota who works to bring her late husbands Tokyo ramen shop back to its former glory, and Chinese Masuda Sei who cleans up bullet trains at Tokyo Station.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Time-lapse Japan
programme.desc: The Jomon period dates roughly from 13,000 to 300 BC. We examine various aspects of Jomon society, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: the Sannai Maruyama Site.

programme.title: BOSAI:Science that Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: Japans snow is a big draw for tourists, but snow and ice can also pose dangers to drivers. Well look at some Japanese technology being developed to prevent whiteouts and accidents on slippery roads.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to hot water. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #7 Please speak slowly. / To ask someone to speak slowly, say yukkuri hanashite kudasai.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: Japanese high-tech toys, fusing advanced technology and kawaii culture, are booming, even in education and space exploration. Through a Chinese woman at a toy maker, we look at their global advance.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: We introduce a lineup of programs conveying Japans unique perspectives and cultural practices. Themes include falconry, etiquette, and the National Museum of Japanese History.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: At the Niihama Taiko Matsuri, teams of around 150 people carry taikodai: three-tonne parade floats housing a huge taiko drum. They compete to give the most powerful synchronized performance.

programme.title: Nuns Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about the fall chrysanthemum festival and the autumnal equinox, or shubun. The nuns enjoy sushi, salad, and dumplings made specially for the occasion.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nations long history.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: BIZ STREAM SPECIAL EDITION
programme.desc: A Recipe for Succession: From finding business successors to preserving prized recipes, this episode focuses on ensuring the survival of companies and products that are at risk of disappearing.

programme.title: One in Every Japanese
programme.desc: 1 in 156 Japanese are transgenders. In a society still lacking in understanding, we talk to transgender people about work, marriage, leisure, as they try to live their normal daily lives.

programme.title: Darwins Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Thailands Asian openbill storks have no time to feel squeamish about their daily diet. After all, their beaks must move with deft precision to extract the soft flesh inside...of 200 snails each!

programme.title: Kortbaneliv
programme.desc: Tobias og Delia flytter fra Oslo til den lille bygda Golnes i Finnmark for å restaurere et gammelt hus. Kjell starter sitt nye liv som bakkemannskap.

programme.title: Monsen og nasjonalparkene
programme.desc: Monsen besøker et av sine favorittsteder. Først midtsommers når naturen bugner av liv, og så i desember når alt hviler. Monsen følger bjørnens rytme.

programme.title: Monsen og nasjonalparkene
programme.desc: Denne parken faller Monsen pladask for. Han er takknemlig for å oppleve dette urgamle stedet, hvor folk har levd i pakt med naturen i tusenvis av år.

programme.title: Grankrigen
programme.desc: Ein tradisjon i ferd med å skli ut? I Bohuslan tevlar folk om å lage det største påskebålet av gamle juletre. Brannvesenet jobbar på spreng. Presten oppmodar til forsoning.

programme.title: NRK Nyheter 06
programme.desc: Siste nytt fra Dagsnytt.

programme.title: Blåfjell 2 - Jakten på det magiske horn
programme.desc: Blånissene har forsovet seg og hos rødnissene er det krise. En isbre truer med å knuse gården! Kan dronning Fjellrose hjelpe rødnissekonge Dreng?

programme.title: Jul på Skansen
programme.desc: Pernilla Wahlgren inviterer til allsang av både gamle og nye julesanger sammen med Carola, Marcus And Martinus, Mapei, Laleh og Alive Gospel med flere.

programme.title: Olav på Kvipt
programme.desc: Olav har fullt opp å gjere, og reiser den eine bygninga etter den andre. Men den nye utedoen vert altfor fin. Han får òg pris frå Kulturminnefondet.

programme.title: Olav på Kvipt
programme.desc: Olav tek med seg ein kompisgjeng og dreg endeleg tilbake til USA for å hente hot rod-en han bygde der i 2019.

programme.desc: Korleis har svarte menneske tradisjonelt vorte avbilda i kunst? Antikkmagasinet løfter fram nokre av dei som bryt med normane og forandrar bildet.

programme.title: Antikkmagasinet
programme.desc: Tidlaus og haldbar formgjeving gjer kvardagen vakrare. Men kva gjer ein gjenstand til ein designklassikar?

programme.title: Antikkmagasinet
programme.desc: Glamorøs camping er ein heit trend. Men ikkje alle veit kor mykje krig har hatt å seie for komfort i friluftslivet.

programme.title: Olav på Kvipt
programme.desc: Kjærleiken er ei utfordring for Olav. Ein bortgøymd gard som Kvipt er ikkje for alle. Men no skal han på date med den nye kjærasten Cecilie.

programme.title: Midway - Fur die Freiheit
programme.desc: Roland Emmerich schickt Woody Harrelson und Luke Evans in die spektakulare Luftschlacht um die Midway-Inseln: 1942 bekampfen US-Truppen im Pazifik die zahlenmaSSig uberlegene japanische Armee.

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: In dieser adrenalingeladenen Neuinterpretation des Kultklassikers aus den 80er Jahren nimmt der ehemalige UFC-Kampfer Dalton einen Job als Tursteher in einem Road House auf den Florida Keys an, nur um festzustellen, dass dieses Paradies nicht so ist, wie es scheint.

programme.title: Kaminfeuer mit Joko And Klaas
programme.desc: Volle 77 Minuten entspannter und interessanter Talk vor dem Kaminfeuer. In den Hauptrollen: Joko And Klaas. Der Anlass: Eine Strafe im Rahmen von Joko And Klaas gegen ProSieben.

programme.title: Galileo Kids
programme.desc: Im gestrandeten Raumschiff von Cosmo dreht sich heute alles um das Thema Feuer. Mit welchen coolen Tricks loschen Aliens Flammen? Warum springen in den USA die Smokejumper mitten in Waldbrande? Und wer von den jungen Zuschauer:innen hat das Zeug zum Feuerwehrmann? Vince und der schlaue AuSSerirdische beantworten all diese Fragen.

programme.title: Unglaublich! Spektakulare Momente vor laufender Kamera
programme.desc: In Kenias groSStem Nationalpark reiSSt eine Sturzflut einen Tanklaster mit. Der Fahrer rettet sich auf das Dach, im Wasser wimmelt es von Krokodilen. Zwei Bruder versuchen ihn per Hubschrauber zu retten. Doch aus dem Laster lauft Benzin aus. Ein Funke wurde genugen, um alles in Flammen zu setzen ... Ein Base-Jumper springt von einer Klippe, dabei bleibt sein Fallschirm an einem dunnen Ast hangen. Jetzt baumelt er 90 Meter uber dem todlichen Abgrund.

programme.title: Unglaublich! Spektakulare Momente vor laufender Kamera
programme.desc: Ein Kajakfahrer gerat bei einem Sprung von einem Wasserfall hinter den Wasservorhang. Er droht vom Sog unter die Felsen gezogen zu werden und zu ertrinken. Ein Weltmeister im Downhill-Mountainbiken unternimmt eine riskante Fahrt auf einem zerklufteten Bergkamm und sturzt einen Abgrund hinab. Bei einem Schnorchelausflug auf einem klassischen Piratenschiff bricht ein Feuer aus. Das Schiff steht innerhalb von Minuten in Flammen, alle 80 Passagiere mussen schleunigst von Bord ...

programme.title: Galileo
programme.desc: Eine volle Stunde Galileo, das heiSSt eine volle Stunde Interessantes und Wissenswertes in gewohnter Premium-Qualitat - und mit einer Themenvielfalt, die ihresgleichen sucht.

programme.title: Galileo
